description: People of Odisha know the importance of this refinery & how this refinery will contribute to the development of Odisha: PM begins his speech — PMO India (@PMOIndia) February 7, 2016 You have come here in large numbers. You are supporting such an important development initiative: PM @narendramodi htt…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Paradip Refinery is Odisha's Vikas Deep. It will fulfil several aspirations of Odisha's bright youngsters. 

Emphasised on vitality of futuristic projects, completed on time. Noted with joy how Paradip Refinery is a great example of #makeinindia. http://nm-4.com/etpf
